activities.name: External Barcode Scanner - Exercise
activities.label: True or False: The external barcode scanner must remain in the cradle to use it.

valid.label: Right!
valid.text: The external barcode scanner can remain in the cradle or be used as a handheld device.

invalid.label: Sorry,
invalid.text: the correct answer is False. The external barcode scanner can remain in the cradle or be used as a handheld device.
